Special_Requirements: Registration required 6 months from first AP; ORN if filing elsewhere
IIR only; no UTPR/QDMTT enacted yet

Notes: GILTI may offset some top-up tax

Jurisdiction: 1. IIR/UTPR/QDMTT_Effective_Date: Date from which rules apply for fiscal years beginning on or after
2. Enacted: Yes/No - whether domestic legislation passed
3. QDMTT_Qualified_Status: Per OECD Central Record - Yes/Pending/No
4. Safe_Harbour_Available: Whether transitional safe harbours can be applied
5. DFE_Accepted: Whether jurisdiction accepts Designated Filing Entity submissions
6. Last_Verified: Update when checking against official sources
7. Always verify against OECD Inclusive Framework status and domestic tax authority
